abstract: 'Even though he was my wife's father, he was like a father to me.'
description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001300; Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men); Active; 2007
